title: ZoomPanView
description: ZoomPanView is a custom Android view that allows users to zoom, pan, and rotate images. It provides interactive gestures for manipulating images and supports smooth zooming and panning functionality.

title: CleanArch-NewsApp
description: News App (inspired from Inshots) which includes - Layered Modularisation, Paging 3, Room, Retrofit, Dagger Hilt

title: Biometric-Authentication in Android
description: By using biometric login, instead of having to remember an account username and password every time to open your app, users can just use their biometric credentials to confirm their presence and authorize access to the private content.

title: Checkout more on Github
description: Checkout Rahul Ray on Github (raystatic) | Android Developer
